group_1.textRight: Thank you for your hard work, Yacchan.

group_1.textLeft: Good work to you too, Mifuyu.
Today it was just a familiar, huh...

group_1.textRight: Yes...
Is something the matter...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... I think we might have been putting@too much effort into our patrols lately.

group_1.textRight: Last time, it was because Mikazuki@Manor's big sis was involved...
It is only natural that@we would increase our patrols.

group_1.textLeft: But...because of that,@your parents are monitoring you more closely, right?
They increased your lessons because@they thought you were sneaking out to play...

group_1.textRight: ...Please do not worry for my sake.
If our loved ones were attacked by@a witch the one day I don't patrol,
I think that I would regret it.

group_1.textLeft: ...Thank you.
But still, I'm sorry...

group_1.textRight: Please, do not worry so much...
However...Yacchan, you should also not overdo it.@Make sure to rest once in a while, okay?
Because you're balancing your@job with magical girl activities,
you must be physically@and mentally exhausted...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...
But I want to continue doing@what I can a little more.
I've finally gotten the knack@for cooperating with you, Mifuyu.
I don't want to forget this good feeling.

group_1.textRight: ...In that case, I will also have to work harder!
I have become stronger than before...
And yet, I still tend to rely on you, Yacchan...

group_1.textLeft: You can't just force yourself not to...

group_1.textRight: Uuu...@My apologies...

group_1.textLeft: ...Hehe.@As it is, this isn't good after all.
When I try to work harder,@you also try to work harder.
Both of us will end up getting exhausted,@you know...

group_1.textRight: Please do not make it a habit to worry...
Because when the two of us are together,@we become a full-fledged magical girl!
It is only natural the two of us do our best.

group_1.textLeft: ...Thank you.
...Then it's decided!
This week,@there haven't been any big incidents.
Just for a little bit next week,@let's reduce our patrols and see what happens.

group_1.textRight: Would that be alright...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.@I still have a grief seed, you know.

group_1.textRight: That's a relief...
I agree then.@I think that it is a good idea.
